title: Server-side preffrences disabled, will we get them back?
body: As of 20 something minutes ago the server side preferences went down and all my settings reset. My question is will we get back our settings or will i have to rebind all my settings again?

replies.body: I don't have an exact timeline on when they'll be turned back on, but you can stay updated by [**checking the status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)!
wondering the same. not going to play till i know
